org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.web.servlet

类 DispatcherServletAutoConfiguration.DispatcherServletRegistrationConfiguration

  • 封闭类:
    DispatcherServletAutoConfiguration

    @Configuration
 @Conditional(value=org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.web.servlet.DispatcherServletAutoConfiguration.DispatcherServletRegistrationCondition.class)
 @ConditionalOnClass(value=javax.servlet.ServletRegistration.class)
 @EnableConfigurationProperties(value=WebMvcProperties.class)
 @Import(value=DispatcherServletAutoConfiguration.DispatcherServletConfiguration.class)
protected static class DispatcherServletAutoConfiguration.DispatcherServletRegistrationConfiguration
extends Object
